clubs.name: .devClub
clubs.description: A community of passionate developers focusing on web, mobile, and AI applications. Weekly coding jams, guest lectures from alumni in tech, and hands-on workshops in modern frameworks like React, Spring Boot, and Flutter.

clubs.name: Linux Fans
clubs.description: For anyone fascinated by Linux, open-source culture, and tinkering with kernels. Share dotfiles, customize shells, and learn how to automate your system. Join us now for a numerous Linux-related activities

clubs.name: Anime lovers
clubs.description: A welcoming space for anime fans to discuss shows, plan movie nights, and share creative fanworks. Expect lively debates, cosplay tips, and screenings of seasonal anime.

clubs.name: Board Games Society
clubs.description: Join us for some fun with variety of games, from simple games like Uno, Cribbage to more multiplayer-based games

clubs.name: Chess Club
clubs.description: Fancying playing chess? Or wanting to become a chess-mastermind? Look no further to our clubs. Join us for more information on chess matches with training sessions on playing chess or generating strategies.
